metadata.how_to_trigger: Load BGO_Main. From debug book Quest flags and options -> Act3 -> Danthelon Dancing Axe -> Add Jaheira as companion.Dialog with Jaheira starts, accept her as companion.Teleport to larian://bookmark?name=BGO_DanthelonDancingAxe&mod=GustavDev&level=BGO_Main_A&camPos=0.709298;50.450680;129.280289&camTarget=-0.058590;50.180027;129.860886Enter the shop, talk to guard.

0.speaker: Somi
0.text: Entharl's retired the dancing axe, too. Was the only reason anyone came into this place.
0.context: NodeContext: Unfazed - they'll take care of Danthelon, whatever happens

1.speaker: Somi
1.text: Don't draw any trouble on old Entharl. He acts like he's up for it, but he's retired for a reason.
1.context: NodeContext: Unfazed - they'll take care of Danthelon, whatever happens

2.speaker: Somi
2.text: Go on. If the Steel Watch come poking around, my brother and I will earn our coin.
2.context: NodeContext: Unfazed - they'll take care of Danthelon, whatever happens
